summary: Iteration 51 - PWA Features, Compact FOR_YOU Cards, Mobile Overflow, and PLAY_ALL Button Testing. All 16 requested features verified. Frontend testing only.
critical_code_review_comments: PASS: FOR_YOU recommendation cards use compact h-20 md:h-24 height classes (96px actual height on desktop)
PASS: FOR_YOU section displays 6 recommendation cards in grid layout
PASS: PLAY_ALL button present in FOR_YOU section header with PlayCircle icon
PASS: PLAY_ALL button click queues recommendations to audio queue
PASS: Mobile overflow (390x844) - Dashboard: body=390px, viewport=390px, diff=0px
PASS: Mobile overflow (390x844) - Discover: body=390px, viewport=390px, diff=0px
PASS: Mobile overflow (390x844) - History: body=390px, viewport=390px, diff=0px
PASS: Mobile overflow (390x844) - Settings: body=390px, viewport=390px, diff=0px
PASS: Mobile overflow (390x844) - Saved: body=390px, viewport=390px, diff=0px
PASS: Mobile overflow (390x844) - Offline: body=390px, viewport=390px, diff=0px
PASS: Mobile overflow (390x844) - Briefing: body=390px, viewport=390px, diff=0px
PASS: Network status icon (data-testid='network-status') visible in header with WifiHigh/4g indicator
PASS: Mobile bottom nav has correct items: FEED, DISCOVER, BRIEFING, SAVED, HISTORY, OFFLINE, MORE (7 items)
PASS: Mobile bottom nav does NOT contain SEARCH icon (search is desktop-only)
PASS: Desktop sidebar includes SEARCH navigation item
PASS: FOR_YOU cards display as 2-column grid on mobile (206px per column)
test_credentials: Guest mode: Click 'Oya, Play' button on landing page
seed_data_creation: None - used existing recommendation data from listening history
context_for_next_testing_agent: All mobile overflow issues resolved with overflow-x-hidden on all pages. FOR_YOU cards are compact (h-20/h-24). PLAY_ALL button queues top 5 recommendations. PWA hooks (useNetworkInfo, useWakeLock, useInstallPrompt, useAppBadge) are implemented in /app/frontend/src/hooks/usePwaApis.js. Network status icon uses WifiHigh/WifiMedium/WifiLow/WifiSlash based on connection quality. Tour guide modal may appear for new users - dismiss with SKIP_TOUR.

compact_for_you_cards.notes: Image container uses h-20 md:h-24 (80-96px), reduced from h-28 md:h-32

play_all_button.notes: Button in FOR_YOU header, click queues recommendations

mobile_nav_no_search.notes: Mobile nav: FEED, DISCOVER, BRIEFING, SAVED, HISTORY, OFFLINE, MORE

pwa_network_info_hook.notes: useNetworkInfo hook provides online, effectiveType, downlink, saveData

dashboard_header_renders.notes: DashboardHeader compiles and renders without errors

pwa_api_implementations.useWakeLock: Keeps screen awake during audio playback, re-acquires on visibility change
pwa_api_implementations.useInstallPrompt: Captures beforeinstallprompt for custom install button
